title: Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina Named Top 5 U.S./Caribbean Resort Destination
text:
Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina
Hotel in Fort Myers Beach honored by the members and visitors of Marinas.com
FORT MYERS BEACH, Fla. , Oct. 20, Giving boaters yet another reason to tie up in the Sunshine State, Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina has been named one of the Top 5 U.S./Caribbean Resort Destinations by Marinas.com.
A website dedicated to helping boaters navigate the waterways, Marinas.com shares information on marinas in the United States , Canada and the Caribbean as well as the UK and Continental Europe. Members and visitors of the website vote on their favorite marinas based on specific categories such as transient marinas, family-oriented marinas, home port marinas, etc.
Home to the premier marina in Fort Myers, Florida , Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina features 41 slips up to 100 feet in size with floating docks, power pedestals, 30, 50 and 100 amp electrical service, special fuel discounts for all docking boats, water hook-ups, pump-out services, a full-time dock master, Ships Store with marine supplies, beverages and snacks, high-definition Direct TV, Wi-Fi, pet-friendly amenities and ADA accessibility. In addition to the recent award from Marinas.com, the marina in Ft. Myers, FL was named in the Top 25 Places to Tie Up by Power & Motoryacht Magazine .
Boaters will not only enjoy the comfortable and convenient features of the harbor, but all marina guests are granted full access to the resort's exceptional amenities. Located on 12 pristine acres along the Gulf of Mexico , travelers can soak up the sun while surrounded by sugary white sands and endless waves, or make a splash in one of the three resort-style pools.
Sailors looking for a little relaxation after a rough ride can indulge in some tropical tranquility at Aquagene Spa , a full-service spa boasting 6,000 square feet of lavish treatment rooms and refreshing lounge space. Or, simply grab a handcrafted cocktail and some seafood satisfaction at Bongo's Bar & Grill, situated right by the pool for easy access.
About Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina
Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina, a Boykin Management Company Property, is located in Fort Myers Beach, Florida along a quarter mile of immaculate coastline. The resort features 213 beachfront studio- and condo-style accommodations overlooking the Gulf of Mexico and the barrier islands of Southwest Florida , Sanibel and Captiva. Pink Shell was the first resort on the beaches of Fort Myers and Sanibel to be designated a Green Lodging Property by the Florida Department of Environmental Protection (FDEP). The resort features many recreational activities in a family-friendly atmosphere. For information, visit www.PinkShell.com or call 1-888-222-7465. Like Pink Shell Beach Resort & Marina on Facebook , follow the resort on Twitter and add it to a circle on Google Plus .
About Boykin Management Company
Boykin Management Company (BMC), a leading hospitality management company with offices in Charlotte, North Carolina and Fort Myers Beach, Florida is consistently recognized for excellence in delivering value-added lodging operations. Since 1958, BMC has been developing, managing and operating hotels, resorts, condominium hotels and conference centers. In addition to BMC's long-standing relationships with the industry's leading hotel brands including Marriott, Hilton, DoubleTree, Embassy Suites, Radisson, Crowne Plaza, Hampton Inn and Holiday Inn, BMC has operated numerous independent resorts and hotels. BMC has managed more than 20,000 rooms in 23 states since its inception. For more information, please go to www.Boykin.com .
